cst8284.triviatime

类 QAPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.triviatime.QAPane

  • public class QAPane
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines the pane of question and answers to be shown onto the center of the root pane.
    从以下版本开始:
    jdk1.8.0_161
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Roger Li
    另请参阅:
    ActionEvent, Insets, Pos, Button, Label, RadioButton, ToggleGroup, HBox, VBox, Color

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox qaPane
      A VBox that contains a QA object related information and the related button
      private javafx.scene.control.RadioButton[] rbAr
      An array contains a series of RadioButton objects

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      QAPane(QA qa)
      Creates a instance of VBox that contains question, answer list, answer button, radio buttons of QA related information

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAnswerPane

        public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getAnswerPane(java.lang.String[] answerAr)
        Returns a VBox object that contains a group of RadioButton objects attached with answers
        参数:
        answerAr - - a group of possible answers to given question
        返回:
        a VBox object with the answer group in it

      • getRadioButtonSelected

        public int getRadioButtonSelected()
        Returns the index of selected RadioButton array element
        返回:
        an integer representing the index of selected radio button

        Sets QAPane with given VBox object
        参数:
